short_description: A classic fighting game series returns with updated visuals, mechanics, and a robust single-player story mode.
A tense, first-person PvPvE bounty hunting game set in a dark and gritty late 19th-century world.
An open-world action RPG with fast-paced combat, stunning visuals, and a captivating story in a post-apocalyptic world.
A tactical military simulation game set on Everon, focusing on realistic combat and sandbox gameplay.
Work for a company by collecting scrap from abandoned, industrialized moons to meet your quota, while surviving terrifying creatures.
Realistic tactical FPS where players scavenge for loot and extract from a hazardous dark zone to get rich.
Stylish urban fantasy action RPG with fast-paced combat and a captivating story in a post-apocalyptic world.
Remake of ARK: Survival Evolved built in Unreal Engine 5, featuring dinosaurs, crafting, and survival challenges.
Lead your civilization from ancient times to the future, building an empire and dominating the world.
Sequel to the popular third-person MOBA, featuring gods battling it out in strategic team-based combat.
A next-generation MMORPG featuring vast open worlds to explore, dynamic combat, and the ability to transform into animals.
A survival action RPG where you explore a decaying world, craft, fight monsters, and uncover the mysteries of the Shroud.
An episodic survival horror where you explore an abandoned toy factory and evade vengeful, oversized toys.
A co-op adventure where a couple on the brink of divorce are magically turned into dolls and must work together to return to normal.
A large-scale action game where you face off against massive armies as historical warriors in ancient China.
A hockey simulation game with updated rosters, enhanced graphics, and improved gameplay mechanics.
A roguelike deckbuilder where you create powerful synergies to defeat increasingly difficult poker hands.
A minimalist puzzle game where players manipulate sliding tiles to solve geometric challenges.
A fantasy RPG where the protagonist must solve a national crisis using unique "Archetype" abilities.

game_title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle
short_description: A first-person action-adventure game following Indiana Jones on a globe-trotting quest to unravel a mystery.
Brutal World War II FPS focused on large-scale battles with strategic team-based gameplay and realistic combat.
Mario explores Princess Peach's castle and retrieves stars hidden within paintings to rescue her from Bowser.
Explore the post-apocalyptic Chornobyl Exclusion Zone, battling mutated creatures and uncovering its dark secrets.
Post-apocalyptic MMOFPS with PvP and PvE combat set in a Chornobyl-inspired zone with anomalies and factions.
Manage and optimize a supermarket with friends, stocking shelves and serving customers in a chaotic cooperative experience.
Explore a vast world, battle monsters, and create a unique character in this anime-inspired sequel.
A cooperative horror game where players must survive twisted experiments during the Cold War era.
Play as three androids in near-future Detroit, making choices that determine their destinies and the city's future.
Experience realistic mixed martial arts combat with a roster of fighters and intuitive controls.
A cozy, community simulation MMO where players build homes, craft, and uncover mysteries together in a vibrant world.
A realistic survival simulator set in the Amazon rainforest, where you must learn to survive using only what you can find.
Experience incredibly realistic flight with advanced graphics and detailed environments, simulating real-world aviation scenarios.
An auto-battler where players assemble and strategically position teams to battle against other players' compositions.
Explore a procedurally generated universe with endless planets, alien life, crafting, and base building.
Manage your own farm, cultivate crops, raise livestock, and expand your agricultural empire with realistic equipment and mechanics.
Agents defend Washington D.C. in a post-pandemic world with tactical gear and co-op missions.
An all-star cast of Nintendo and gaming icons battle it out in chaotic, platform-based arenas.
A parkour-infused, first-person zombie survival game where players scavenge and fight for their lives during the day and night.
Players will need to fight back against the Nazis as a deadly sniper, fighting from the shadows.
Explore a supernatural 17th-century island, craft, fight monsters, and conquer territory in a persistent online world.
Explore a vibrant island, make friends with Sanrio characters, and uncover secrets in this cozy open-world adventure.
Manage a news channel, make editorial decisions, and shape public opinion in this narrative-driven simulation.
Destroy your enemies with powerful weapons. Get upgrades and become even stronger!
A rogue-like shooter where you play as Isaac, battling grotesque creatures in a randomly generated dungeon.
A tactical open-world extraction shooter set in a post-apocalyptic United States ravaged by extreme weather.
A young man returns home after his mother's murder and is pulled back into a life of crime.
An open-world dress-up adventure game with exploration, crafting, and social elements.
Vault Hunters must stop the Calypso Twins from uniting the bandit clans and claiming the galaxy's ultimate power.
A classic MMORPG with nation-based PvP, character progression, and questing in a medieval fantasy world.
Manage your own supermarket, stock shelves, set prices, and expand your business.
